[![License](http://img.shields.io/badge/License-Apache_2-red.svg?style=flat)](http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0)

# pag

Project archetypes generator

# Installation

```shell
npm install pag -g
```

# Example

```shell
npm install pag-template-node-module -g

# list all templates
pag --list-templates

# create a node.js module
mkdir test
cd test
pag node-module
```
